Join the Conversation: #abramsonyoungfriends

blocks.name: Home Hero
blocks.notes: Main feature on the homepage. Chooses a random background image on load.
blocks.html:
Only at Penn Medicine

With every new breakthrough at Penns Abramson Cancer Center, were discovering that the cure for cancer isnt just within reach, its within us all.

Find a Doctor Request an Appointment

blocks.name: Breadcrumb Navigation
blocks.notes: Shows the trail of pages up to the current and also acts as secondary navigation

blocks.name: Sharebar
blocks.notes: The sharebar is located at the bottom of pages and shares the current page on different social media sites
blocks.html: Share Page Facebook Twitter Print Email

blocks.name: Slider
blocks.notes: The default slider - randomizes the "1" position (slides stay in the same order, but start position is randomized)
blocks.html:
Lorem Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet

Dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit morg treng rewc venud pomg weghik.

Call to action link
Slide 2 Title

Slide 2 descriptive text.

Call to action link
Third Slide Longer Title

Dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit morg.

Call to action link
Slide Number 4

Adipiscing elit morg treng rewc venud pomg weghik.

Call to action link

blocks.name: Story Slider
blocks.notes: Displays up to 10 patient stories, etc. Number displaying at a time changes based on layout and screen size

blocks.name: Tabs
blocks.notes: Tabs go in the main content area of the page and shift to an accordion view at mobile.

templates.name: Breakthroughs Landing
templates.notes: This template uses a unique layout.

templates.name: Cancer Type Landing
templates.notes: Landing page for a single cancer type.

templates.name: Cancer Types Landing
templates.notes: Landing page for all cancer types.

templates.name: Event Detail
templates.notes: Displays details about a single event.

templates.name: Home Page
templates.notes: The global site home page for Penn Cancer

templates.name: Master Sub
templates.notes: The master sub template is a typical sub page containing all usual global elements with a rich text body area.
